First time when I started playing cs:go I felt like I couldn't do anything, after awhile of playing cs:go I started to grasp the aim placement, and learnt how to pre-fire, throw smokes, nades and flashes, the game itself is quite challenging because, there are ranks, that go from silver 1 to the global elite, I'm stuck in gold nova, cause the teammates often leave matches and trash talk or just don't want to communicate or work as a team. If I'd have to count how many times that has happened to me for the past 300hours of cs:go gameplay I'd go sane, cause it's pretty frustrating when your teammates abandon the match and you are left with 1-4 other teammates. Whitch makes the match harder since it's 5v5, atleast in competitive that is. But overall I'd recommend this game to everyone, this game can boost your reaction time, muscle memory. But the down effects may be by playing with not that pleasant teammates.
good game when the shots hit

I wonder why this game is still alive.
- Operations are literally pay to play
- Hit boxes don't exist
- Cobblestone is still getting reworked (more then 3 years already)
- Its clear Developer don't play and care about their game
